title: [WANTED] Streamer
body:
Hi everybody !

You have probably seen the Interboard Tournament I am organizing. Im currently looking for a caster who can stream the games.

For the moment we dont have the schedule but the games will be probably played the week-end.

It could be great if you could give us the videos of the games after the stream to upload it on YouTube or Dailymotion, or anything else.

I'll edit this message sometimes, so keep an eye on this thread !

[Link to the main thread](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/it/c/esport-it/bUWVEgv7-interforum-concorrenza)

Thanks to you ! :)


EDIT : Dates have been written on the main thread.
